Package org.lwjgl.system.linux

Class X11.Functions

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.linux.X11.Functions
Enclosing class:
X11
public static final class X11.Functions extends Object
Contains the function pointers loaded from the X11 SharedLibrary.
